# Behavioural experiments at SWC {background-color="#03A062"}

## A variety of projects

- Species: mouse, rat, fiddler crab, insects
- Setups: head-fixed and free-moving
- Tasks: open field, social behaviour, decision-making, foraging, etc.
- Experimental control: [bonsai](https://bonsai-rx.org/), [Bpod](https://sanworks.github.io/Bpod_Wiki/), custom...
- Tracking: a mix of DeepLabCut & SLEAP

## Our strategy

- Don't reinvent the wheel:
  - use existing tools where possible
  - focus on trainings for those
- Develop new tools where necessary
  - Identify common but unserved needs
  - Develop general-purpose tools fill the gap
